hadiths.text: Nu'man b. Bashir reported that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite on two 'Ids and in Friday prayer:" Glorify The name of Thy Lord, the Most High" (Surah lxxxvii.), and:" Has there come to thee the news of the overwhelming event" (lxxxviii.). And when the 'Id and Jumu'a combined on a day he recited these two (surah) in both the prayers

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُقْرَأُ فِي صَلاَةِ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What is to be recited in Jumu`ah prayer
